segments.content: Hi everyone!
segments.sourceMdx: Hi everyone!
segments.translated_content: 大家好！

segments.content: This week, we've got many articles from the React and React-Native community, and the latest Expo Launch Party announcements. Some articles are very long, and I didn't have time to read them all.
segments.sourceMdx: This week, we've got many articles from the React and React-Native community, and the latest Expo Launch Party announcements. Some articles are very long, and I didn't have time to read them all.
segments.translated_content: 本周我们汇集了大量来自React和React-Native社区的文章，以及最新的Expo Launch Party公告。部分文章篇幅较长，我尚未能全部阅读完毕。

segments.content: 📷 I've been too busy creating the newsletter's [**Instagram account**](https://www.instagram.com/thisweekinreact/)! I plan to post visual React news and tips there, including the best memes I couldn't include here 🤭.
segments.sourceMdx: 📷 I've been too busy creating the newsletter's [**Instagram account**](https://www.instagram.com/thisweekinreact/)! I plan to post visual React news and tips there, including the best memes I couldn't include here 🤭.
segments.translated_content: 📷 最近我正忙于运营本刊的[**Instagram账号**](https://www.instagram.com/thisweekinreact/)！计划在那里发布可视化React资讯和小技巧，包括那些未能在此处展示的最佳梗图🤭。

segments.content: 🧑 I've also removed the Jobs section, which didn't add much: I'll see later how to reintegrate it.
segments.sourceMdx: 🧑 I've also removed the Jobs section, which didn't add much: I'll see later how to reintegrate it.
segments.translated_content: 🧑 我已移除了效果不佳的招聘板块，后续会考虑如何重新整合。

segments.content: 👥 For React-Native devs: [React Native EU](https://www.react-native.eu/) (Wrocław/Poland, 7-8 September) is offering us a [-15% discount on admissions](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15).
segments.sourceMdx: 👥 For React-Native devs: [React Native EU](https://www.react-native.eu/) (Wrocław/Poland, 7-8 September) is offering us a [-15% discount on admissions](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15).
segments.translated_content: 👥 React-Native开发者请注意：[React Native EU](https://www.react-native.eu/)大会（9月7-8日，波兰弗罗茨瓦夫）为我们提供了[-15%门票折扣](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15)。

segments.translated_content: [**企业级Feed、聊天和视频API！**](https://getstream.io/video/docs/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)

segments.content: Stream is the maker of enterprise-grade **APIs** and **SDKs** that help product and engineering teams solve two common problems at scale: in-app chat and social activity feeds.
segments.sourceMdx: Stream is the maker of enterprise-grade **APIs** and **SDKs** that help product and engineering teams solve two common problems at scale: in-app chat and social activity feeds.
segments.translated_content: Stream提供企业级**API**和**SDK**，帮助产品与工程团队规模化解决两大常见需求：应用内聊天和社交动态流。

segments.content: With Stream, developers can integrate any type of messaging or feed experience into their app in a fraction of the time it would take to build these features from scratch. Stream Chat makes it easy for developers to integrate rich, real-time messaging into their applications.
segments.sourceMdx: With Stream, developers can integrate any type of messaging or feed experience into their app in a fraction of the time it would take to build these features from scratch. Stream Chat makes it easy for developers to integrate rich, real-time messaging into their applications.
segments.translated_content: 通过Stream，开发者能以远低于自主开发的耗时，为应用集成各类消息或信息流功能。Stream Chat让开发者轻松实现富实时消息功能。

segments.content:
Stream provides robust client-side SDKs for popular frameworks such as [**React**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsorship\&utm_content=\&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22), [**React-Native**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react-native/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=sponsorship\&utm_content=\&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22), Expo, Flutter, Android, Angular, Compose, Unreal, and iOS.
Unlock enterprise-grade features, functions, and UI components completely free for your startup or side project with the Maker Account.
segments.sourceMdx:
Stream provides robust client-side SDKs for popular frameworks such as [**React**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22), [**React-Native**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react-native/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22), Expo, Flutter, Android, Angular, Compose, Unreal, and iOS.
Unlock enterprise-grade features, functions, and UI components completely free for your startup or side project with the Maker Account.
segments.translated_content: Stream为热门框架提供强力客户端SDK，包括[**React**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)、[**React-Native**](https://getstream.io/chat/sdk/react-native/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=sponsorship&utm_content=&utm_campaign=thisweekinreact_July2023_video_klmh22)、Expo、Flutter、Android、Angular、Compose、Unreal和iOS。通过Maker账户可免费解锁企业级功能。

segments.content: ## ⚛️ React
segments.sourceMdx: ## ⚛️ React {#react}
segments.translated_content: ## ⚛️ React核心 {#react}

segments.content: [![Can React Server Actions finally fix forms?](/emails/issues/156/serveractions.jpg)](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-actions)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Can React Server Actions finally fix forms?](/emails/issues/156/serveractions.jpg)](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-actions)
segments.translated_content: [![React服务端操作能彻底解决表单问题吗？](/emails/issues/156/serveractions.jpg)](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-actions)

segments.content: [**Can React Server Actions finally fix forms?**](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-actions)
segments.sourceMdx: [**Can React Server Actions finally fix forms?**](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-actions)
segments.translated_content: [**React服务端操作能彻底解决表单问题吗？**](https://www.mux.com/blog/what-are-react-server-actions)

segments.content: A great introduction to Server Actions, a forthcoming React feature that has already been integrated into Next.js 13.4 (experimental). Includes a short tutorial on uploading a video with a title. Server Actions can return a response to give feedback to the user, but it's clear that this isn't yet an ideal DX.
segments.sourceMdx: A great introduction to Server Actions, a forthcoming React feature that has already been integrated into Next.js 13.4 (experimental). Includes a short tutorial on uploading a video with a title. Server Actions can return a response to give feedback to the user, but it's clear that this isn't yet an ideal DX.
segments.translated_content: 本文深入浅出地介绍了即将推出的React功能——服务端操作（已作为实验性功能集成至Next.js 13.4）。包含视频标题上传的简短教程。虽然服务端操作能返回响应为用户提供反馈，但目前开发者体验仍有优化空间。

segments.content: In my opinion, Server Actions should aim to fully support progressive enhancement. This probably requires to introduce a "flash" API to manage feedback without any client-side JavaScript. This exists in many backend frameworks, and Remix offers a ([`session.flash()`](https://remix.run/docs/en/main/utils/sessions#sessionflashkey-value)) API. Related info that might interest you: with [`action.$$FORM_ACTION`](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1689921046856474625) you can extend React's progressive enhancement behavior.
segments.sourceMdx: In my opinion, Server Actions should aim to fully support progressive enhancement. This probably requires to introduce a "flash" API to manage feedback without any client-side JavaScript. This exists in many backend frameworks, and Remix offers a ([`session.flash()`](https://remix.run/docs/en/main/utils/sessions#sessionflashkey-value)) API. Related info that might interest you: with [`action.$$FORM_ACTION`](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1689921046856474625) you can extend React's progressive enhancement behavior.
segments.translated_content: 在我看来，Server Actions 应当致力于全面支持渐进式增强。这可能需要引入一个"flash" API 来管理用户反馈，而无需任何客户端 JavaScript。许多后端框架已实现此类功能，Remix 就提供了 ([`session.flash()`](https://remix.run/docs/en/main/utils/sessions#sessionflashkey-value)) API。您可能感兴趣的相关信息：通过 [`action.$$FORM_ACTION`](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1689921046856474625) 可以扩展 React 的渐进式增强行为。

segments.content:
* 💸 [Zero To Shipped - Master Fast-Paced Fullstack Development and **Finally** ship that product](https://www.zerotoshipped.com/)
* 🧑‍🎓 [React.dev - Using TypeScript](https://react.dev/learn/typescript): new official documentation page.
* 💬 [Next.js RFC - Google Tag Manager and gtag in next/third-parties](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/discussions/53868): offers to integrate Google Analytics using a hook rather than a component, with possibly Web Worker support.
* 🐦 [Million.js Automatic Mode - Video trailer](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1689773623827943424)
* 📜 [Things you forgot (or never knew) because of React](https://joshcollinsworth.com/blog/antiquated-react): a very long criticism of React, considered to be an outdated framework. It's still an interesting read, even if [I disagree](https://github.com/josh-collinsworth/joco-sveltekit/issues/35#issuecomment-1680817566) and think the author is unfair.
* 📜 [Fantastic closures and how to find them in React](https://www.developerway.com/posts/fantastic-closures): explains what a stale closure is in React and presents various cases that can introduce this problem, then proposes a solution based on `useRef()`.
* 📜 [The simplest example to understand Server Actions in Next.js](https://scastiel.dev/simplest-example-server-actions-nextjs): very simple Server Actions example, easy to understand, and providing a practical way of making RPC calls to your API.
* 📜 [On React Suspense’s throttling](https://andreigatej.dev/blog/on-react-suspense-throttling/): highlights a surprising behaviour of React when you nest `<Suspense>`.
* 📜 [Quit Your YAP-ing](https://kyleshevlin.com/quit-your-yapping): encourages you to abandon the "Yet-Another-Prop" syndrome and use composition instead.
* 📜 [Node.js's Config Hell Problem](https://deno.com/blog/node-config-hell): Deno's criticism of projects like Next.js, which often have dozens of configuration files.
* 📜 [Supabase - Vercel Integration and Next.js App Router Support](https://supabase.com/blog/using-supabase-with-vercel): an integration worth studying. Includes APIs with interesting names like `createClientComponentClient` 😅.
* 📜 [Lifting Off with Astro](https://remotesynthesis.com/blog/lifting-off-with-astro/)
* 📜 [Form Validation with React Hook Form](https://claritydev.net/blog/form-validation-react-hook-form)
* 📜 [Introducing a new lint rule for React Testing Library](https://blog.testdouble.com/posts/2023-07-31-a-new-rtl-lint-rule/)
* 📜 [How to Use Jotai and useTransition for Mutation](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/how-to-use-jotai-and-use-transition-for-mutation/)
* 📜 [Coding the stars - An interactive constellation with Three.js and React Three Fiber](https://supabase.com/blog/interactive-constellation-threejs-react-three-fiber)
* 📦 [React Aria - August 9 Releases - HTML form submit/reset, DropZone, FileTrigger...](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-08-09.html)
* 📦 [Natuerlich - Composable interactions for WebXR experiences - With React-Three-Fiber support](https://github.com/coconut-xr/natuerlich)
* 📦 [Reakit - August 2023 update](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/all-things)
* 📦 [Obsidiosaurus - Obsidian -> Docusaurus Converter](https://github.com/CIMSTA/obsidiosaurus)
* 📦 [tw2panda - Easily migrate code from Tailwind to Panda CSS](https://github.com/astahmer/tw2panda)
* 🎥 [Why I Stopped Using Next.js And Chose Astro Instead](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BoeZqPaYw9s)
* 🎥 [Responsive Framer Motion with Tailwind CSS](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xSuxsfn13xg)
* 🎥 [Dominik Dorfmeister: React Query With The App Router](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R4NHXrvwZWA)

- 💸 [Zero To Shipped - Master Fast-Paced Fullstack Development and **Finally** ship that product](https://www.zerotoshipped.com/)
- 🧑‍🎓 [React.dev - Using TypeScript](https://react.dev/learn/typescript): new official documentation page.
- 💬 [Next.js RFC - Google Tag Manager and gtag in next/third-parties](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/discussions/53868): offers to integrate Google Analytics using a hook rather than a component, with possibly Web Worker support.
- 🐦 [Million.js Automatic Mode - Video trailer](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1689773623827943424)
- 📜 [Things you forgot (or never knew) because of React](https://joshcollinsworth.com/blog/antiquated-react): a very long criticism of React, considered to be an outdated framework. It's still an interesting read, even if [I disagree](https://github.com/josh-collinsworth/joco-sveltekit/issues/35#issuecomment-1680817566) and think the author is unfair.
- 📜 [Fantastic closures and how to find them in React](https://www.developerway.com/posts/fantastic-closures): explains what a stale closure is in React and presents various cases that can introduce this problem, then proposes a solution based on `useRef()`.
- 📜 [The simplest example to understand Server Actions in Next.js](https://scastiel.dev/simplest-example-server-actions-nextjs): very simple Server Actions example, easy to understand, and providing a practical way of making RPC calls to your API.
- 📜 [On React Suspense’s throttling](https://andreigatej.dev/blog/on-react-suspense-throttling/): highlights a surprising behaviour of React when you nest `<Suspense>`.
- 📜 [Quit Your YAP-ing](https://kyleshevlin.com/quit-your-yapping): encourages you to abandon the "Yet-Another-Prop" syndrome and use composition instead.
- 📜 [Node.js's Config Hell Problem](https://deno.com/blog/node-config-hell): Deno's criticism of projects like Next.js, which often have dozens of configuration files.
- 📜 [Supabase - Vercel Integration and Next.js App Router Support](https://supabase.com/blog/using-supabase-with-vercel): an integration worth studying. Includes APIs with interesting names like `createClientComponentClient` 😅.
- 📜 [Lifting Off with Astro](https://remotesynthesis.com/blog/lifting-off-with-astro/)
- 📜 [Form Validation with React Hook Form](https://claritydev.net/blog/form-validation-react-hook-form)
- 📜 [Introducing a new lint rule for React Testing Library](https://blog.testdouble.com/posts/2023-07-31-a-new-rtl-lint-rule/)
- 📜 [How to Use Jotai and useTransition for Mutation](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/how-to-use-jotai-and-use-transition-for-mutation/)
- 📜 [Coding the stars - An interactive constellation with Three.js and React Three Fiber](https://supabase.com/blog/interactive-constellation-threejs-react-three-fiber)

- 📦 [Natuerlich - Composable interactions for WebXR experiences - With React-Three-Fiber support](https://github.com/coconut-xr/natuerlich)
- 📦 [Reakit - August 2023 update](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/all-things)
- 📦 [Obsidiosaurus - Obsidian -> Docusaurus Converter](https://github.com/CIMSTA/obsidiosaurus)
- 📦 [tw2panda - Easily migrate code from Tailwind to Panda CSS](https://github.com/astahmer/tw2panda)
- 🎥 [Why I Stopped Using Next.js And Chose Astro Instead](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BoeZqPaYw9s)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [从零到上线 - 掌握快节奏全栈开发并**最终**发布产品](https://www.zerotoshipped.com/)
- 🧑‍🎓 [React.dev - 使用TypeScript](https://react.dev/learn/typescript): 新增官方文档页面。
- 💬 [Next.js RFC - Google Tag Manager与gtag在next/third-parties中的集成](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/discussions/53868): 提议通过钩子而非组件集成Google Analytics，可能支持Web Worker。
- 🐦 [Million.js自动模式 - 视频预告](https://twitter.com/aidenybai/status/1689773623827943424)
- 📜 [因React而遗忘（或从未知晓）的事](https://joshcollinsworth.com/blog/antiquated-react): 一篇对React作为过时框架的长篇批评。尽管[我持不同意见](https://github.com/josh-collinsworth/joco-sveltekit/issues/35#issuecomment-1680817566)认为作者有失公允，仍值得一读。
- 📜 [React中的奇妙闭包及其发现方法](https://www.developerway.com/posts/fantastic-closures): 解释React中的陈旧闭包问题，列举多种引发场景，并提出基于`useRef()`的解决方案。
- 📜 [Next.js中理解Server Actions的最简示例](https://scastiel.dev/simplest-example-server-actions-nextjs): 极简Server Actions示例，轻松理解如何实现API的RPC调用。
- 📜 [论React Suspense的节流机制](https://andreigatej.dev/blog/on-react-suspense-throttling/): 揭示嵌套`<Suspense>`时React的意外行为。
- 📜 [停止YAP综合症](https://kyleshevlin.com/quit-your-yapping): 呼吁摒弃"Yet-Another-Prop"模式，改用组合方案。
- 📜 [Node.js的配置地狱问题](https://deno.com/blog/node-config-hell): Deno对Next.js等多配置文件项目的批评。
- 📜 [Supabase与Vercel集成及Next.js App Router支持](https://supabase.com/blog/using-supabase-with-vercel): 值得研究的集成方案，包含`createClientComponentClient`等趣味API命名😅。
- 📜 [Astro启航指南](https://remotesynthesis.com/blog/lifting-off-with-astro/)
- 📜 [React Hook Form实现表单验证](https://claritydev.net/blog/form-validation-react-hook-form)
- 📜 [React Testing Library新lint规则发布](https://blog.testdouble.com/posts/2023-07-31-a-new-rtl-lint-rule/)
- 📜 [Jotai与useTransition协同实现数据变更](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/how-to-use-jotai-and-use-transition-for-mutation/)
- 📜 [编码星空 - 使用Three.js与React Three Fiber构建交互式星座图](https://supabase.com/blog/interactive-constellation-threejs-react-three-fiber)
- 📦 [React Aria 8月9日更新 - HTML表单提交/重置、DropZone、FileTrigger...](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-08-09.html)
- 📦 [Natuerlich - 可组合的WebXR交互方案 - 支持React-Three-Fiber](https://github.com/coconut-xr/natuerlich)
- 📦 [Reakit 2023年8月更新](https://newsletter.ariakit.org/p/all-things)
- 📦 [Obsidiosaurus - Obsidian转Docusaurus转换器](https://github.com/CIMSTA/obsidiosaurus)
- 📦 [tw2panda - 轻松从Tailwind迁移至Panda CSS](https://github.com/astahmer/tw2panda)
- 🎥 [为何放弃Next.js选择Astro](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BoeZqPaYw9s)
- 🎥 [使用Tailwind CSS实现响应式Framer Motion动画](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xSuxsfn13xg)
- 🎥 [Dominik Dorfmeister: 在App Router中使用React Query](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R4NHXrvwZWA)

segments.content: ## 💸 Sponsor

segments.content: Hiring front-end developers is hard. 😩 But 4,000+ engineering teams — including at Netflix, Spotify and LinkedIn — have found a better way! 🤠 Skip the algorithm interviews and **run front-end interviews in a fully customizable and collaborative IDE** - where you can:
segments.sourceMdx: Hiring front-end developers is hard. 😩 But 4,000+ engineering teams — including at Netflix, Spotify and LinkedIn — have found a better way! 🤠 Skip the algorithm interviews and **run front-end interviews in a fully customizable and collaborative IDE** - where you can:
segments.translated_content: 招聘前端开发人员很难。😩 但包括Netflix、Spotify和LinkedIn在内的4000多个工程团队找到了更好的方法！🤠 跳过算法面试，**在完全可定制且协作的IDE中运行前端面试**——您可以：

segments.content:
* drag and drop a React (and Angular or Vue) repo
* add packages with npm install
* let candidates use ChatGPT live in the interview
* watch & share code playback after the interview
segments.sourceMdx:
- drag and drop a React (and Angular or Vue) repo
- add packages with npm install
- let candidates use ChatGPT live in the interview
- watch & share code playback after the interview
segments.translated_content:
- 拖放React（以及Angular或Vue）代码库
- 使用npm install添加包
- 允许候选人在面试中实时使用ChatGPT
- 面试后观看并共享代码回放

segments.content: Use CoderPad to run fast, fair and real coding interviews that candidates and interviewers trust. [Sign up for free today & hire with confidence](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia\&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact\&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter).
segments.sourceMdx: Use CoderPad to run fast, fair and real coding interviews that candidates and interviewers trust. [Sign up for free today & hire with confidence](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter).
segments.translated_content: 使用CoderPad进行快速、公平且真实的编码面试，赢得候选人和面试官的信任。[立即免费注册，自信招聘](https://coderpad.io/?utm_medium=3pmedia&utm_source=ThisWeekInReact&utm_campaign=23-Q3-3PMedia-ThisWeekInReact-ACQ-All-Global-Newsletter)。

segments.content: ## 📱 React-Native
segments.sourceMdx: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
segments.translated_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.content: [![Expo Preview - Fully customizable builds on EAS Build](/emails/issues/156/easbuild.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-custom-builds)
segments.sourceMdx: [![Expo Preview - Fully customizable builds on EAS Build](/emails/issues/156/easbuild.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-custom-builds)
segments.translated_content: [![Expo预览 - EAS Build上的完全可定制构建](/emails/issues/156/easbuild.jpg)](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-custom-builds)

segments.content: [**Expo Preview - Fully customizable builds on EAS Build**](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-custom-builds).
segments.sourceMdx: [**Expo Preview - Fully customizable builds on EAS Build**](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-custom-builds).
segments.translated_content: [**Expo预览 - EAS Build上的完全可定制构建**](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-custom-builds)。

segments.content: Expo has come up with a new system for EAS Build that allows you to customise the flow with a Yaml file, which should give you a lot of flexibility to use the monorepo tools of your choice (Nx, Turbo, Rush...) or add your own CI steps. It looks quite similar to GitHub Actions. TIL: it seems EAS is using Fastlane on iOS builds.
segments.sourceMdx: Expo has come up with a new system for EAS Build that allows you to customise the flow with a Yaml file, which should give you a lot of flexibility to use the monorepo tools of your choice (Nx, Turbo, Rush...) or add your own CI steps. It looks quite similar to GitHub Actions. TIL: it seems EAS is using Fastlane on iOS builds.
segments.translated_content: Expo为EAS Build推出了一个新系统，允许您通过Yaml文件自定义流程，这将为您提供极大的灵活性，以使用您选择的monorepo工具（Nx、Turbo、Rush等）或添加您自己的CI步骤。它看起来与GitHub Actions非常相似。今天才知道：EAS似乎在iOS构建上使用了Fastlane。

segments.content:
* 👀 [Expo Proof of concept - expo-sqlite integration with CR-SQLite](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-cr-sqlite): SQLite and CRDT integration to ease creation of local-first mobile apps.
* 👀 [Expo Proof of concept - Expo CLI Dev Tools Plugins](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-dev-tools-plugins): Expo wants to offer a plug-in system for creating DevTools, and presents us a demo with Apollo DevTools. This should eventually replace Flipper plugins.
* 🐦 [Reanimated on react-native-windows demo](https://twitter.com/piaskowyk/status/1689982162886430721)
* 🐦 [Async Components + use() hook demo](https://twitter.com/SzymonRybczak/status/1691037156712599552)
* 🐦 [Half of the Top 20 iOS Sports apps are powered by React Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1690805340290301954)
* 📜 [Tale of a Web Developer Improving Startup Performance for a large React Native App](https://medium.com/engineering-udaan/reacting-to-change-tale-of-a-web-developer-improving-startup-performance-for-a-large-react-native-854f8a4850fd)
* 📜 [Adding React-Native to a complex app - 4-part series](https://www.nearform.com/blog/adding-react-native-to-a-complex-app-part-1-planning/)
* 📜 [Getting started with react native storybook](https://dev.to/dannyhw/getting-started-with-react-native-storybook-96c)
* 📜 [Exploring React Native's New Architecture: A Peek into the New Architecture](https://blog.devvivek.tech/exploring-react-natives-new-architecture-a-peek-into-the-new-architecture)
* 🎙️ [The React Native Show Podcast #25 - Databases for mobile apps React Native & Realm](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/databases-for-mobile-apps-react-native-realm)
* 👥 [React Native EU 2023](https://www.react-native.eu/) (Wrocław, September 7–8, 2023) is offering us [-15% on conference tickets](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15) with code "thisweekinreact15".
segments.sourceMdx:
- 👀 [Expo Proof of concept - expo-sqlite integration with CR-SQLite](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-cr-sqlite): SQLite and CRDT integration to ease creation of local-first mobile apps.
- 👀 [Expo Proof of concept - Expo CLI Dev Tools Plugins](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-dev-tools-plugins): Expo wants to offer a plug-in system for creating DevTools, and presents us a demo with Apollo DevTools. This should eventually replace Flipper plugins.
- 🐦 [Reanimated on react-native-windows demo](https://twitter.com/piaskowyk/status/1689982162886430721)
- 🐦 [Async Components + use() hook demo](https://twitter.com/SzymonRybczak/status/1691037156712599552)
- 🐦 [Half of the Top 20 iOS Sports apps are powered by React Native](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1690805340290301954)
- 📜 [Tale of a Web Developer Improving Startup Performance for a large React Native App](https://medium.com/engineering-udaan/reacting-to-change-tale-of-a-web-developer-improving-startup-performance-for-a-large-react-native-854f8a4850fd)
- 📜 [Adding React-Native to a complex app - 4-part series](https://www.nearform.com/blog/adding-react-native-to-a-complex-app-part-1-planning/)
- 📜 [Getting started with react native storybook](https://dev.to/dannyhw/getting-started-with-react-native-storybook-96c)
- 📜 [Exploring React Native's New Architecture: A Peek into the New Architecture](https://blog.devvivek.tech/exploring-react-natives-new-architecture-a-peek-into-the-new-architecture)
- 🎙️ [The React Native Show Podcast #25 - Databases for mobile apps React Native & Realm](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/databases-for-mobile-apps-react-native-realm)
- 👥 [React Native EU 2023](https://www.react-native.eu/) (Wrocław, September 7–8, 2023) is offering us [-15% on conference tickets](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15) with code "thisweekinreact15".
segments.translated_content:
- 👀 [Expo概念验证 - expo-sqlite与CR-SQLite的集成](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-cr-sqlite)：SQLite和CRDT集成，简化本地优先移动应用的开发。
- 👀 [Expo概念验证 - Expo CLI开发工具插件](https://expo.dev/changelog/2023/08-10-dev-tools-plugins)：Expo希望提供一个插件系统来创建开发工具，并展示了Apollo DevTools的演示。这最终应该会取代Flipper插件。
- 🐦 [react-native-windows上的Reanimated演示](https://twitter.com/piaskowyk/status/1689982162886430721)
- 🐦 [异步组件+use()钩子演示](https://twitter.com/SzymonRybczak/status/1691037156712599552)
- 🐦 [iOS体育类应用前20名中有一半由React Native驱动](https://twitter.com/Baconbrix/status/1690805340290301954)
- 📜 [一位Web开发者提升大型React Native应用启动性能的故事](https://medium.com/engineering-udaan/reacting-to-change-tale-of-a-web-developer-improving-startup-performance-for-a-large-react-native-854f8a4850fd)
- 📜 [将React-Native添加到复杂应用中 - 四部分系列](https://www.nearform.com/blog/adding-react-native-to-a-complex-app-part-1-planning/)
- 📜 [React Native Storybook入门指南](https://dev.to/dannyhw/getting-started-with-react-native-storybook-96c)
- 📜 [探索React Native的新架构：新架构一瞥](https://blog.devvivek.tech/exploring-react-natives-new-architecture-a-peek-into-the-new-architecture)
- 🎙️ [React Native Show播客第25期 - 移动应用数据库：React Native与Realm](https://www.callstack.com/podcasts/databases-for-mobile-apps-react-native-realm)
- 👥 [React Native EU 2023](https://www.react-native.eu/)（2023年9月7-8日，弗罗茨瓦夫）提供[-15%的会议门票折扣](https://ti.to/react-native-eu/2023/discount/thisweekinreact15)，优惠码为"thisweekinreact15"。
